metadata.name: Beta Calls Pass
metadata.description: BetaCalls is a network of curated like-minded individuals passionate about web3. Our mission is to provide everything you need to gain an edge in web3 with our community-first ethos. BetaCalls equips patrons with the latest information and real-time alerts through our analysts, a series of tools, and educational content. Owning this pass gives continued, free access to all of this and any additional services we release in the future.
